data.title: Sholar-Riley Funeral Home
data.meta_description: Explore Life Stories, Offer Condolences & Send Flowers with Sholar-Riley Funeral Home obituaries and Death Notices for the Pleasureville, KY area.
data.text:
About

Sholar-Riley Funeral Home is a collection of obituaries for Pleasureville KY, Henry and Shelby Counties. With services throughout Pleasureville, Eminence, Smithfield, Port Royal, Lock Port, Defoe, New Castle, Bethlehem, Sulphur that are updated regularly. Find local Pleasureville, Kentucky obituaries and join us in celebrating memories and honoring their lives and legacies.
